xs:annotation.xs:documentation: Class identifier: urn:uk:gov:cabinet-office:tc:saml:authn-context:levelX Document identifier: saml-schema-authn-context-ip-2.0 Location: http://docs.oasis-open.org/security/saml/v2.0/ Revision history: V1.2 (Sept, 2014): New authentication context class schema for SAML V2.0 - denotes fraud event at unspecified level of assurance
